data.message: Eminem plz plz don't retire :'( we need you <3 <3 :( we need more albums your music is my everything you are like oxygen Eminem i just can't imagine music without you plz don't ever retire we love you Em <3

replies.message: Don't u want him to be happy if he is happy doing this then I'm happy for him we will always have his music and inspiration what I say is I will still always be the eminem fan I will never say I don't like eminem no more because I love this man I really do all the things he has given me I love it he has been there sence I was Born I was in my moms tummy and my mom would play eminem and I would kick like crazy and ever sence then I have loved eminem I relate so much I think all of his fans relate in a way We will all have each other and hey If we still have each other than we can all get threw times still and still by listening to his music honestly when I herd that eminem was retiring I was devastated I balled and screamed my eyes out honestly I wanted to die I didn't think about actually killing myself because I don't want to die but I did idk how to explain but I know eminem wouldn't want any of us to kill ourselves over him I don't know what else to say
Wholy shit ..ok STAN take it easy over ther
